person.persName: David Thomas Curle (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of D. R. Curle. Married to Mary E. Bass Curle in Green County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1865. Farmhand in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 30, 1861, to January 12, 1865.
